## MultidimensionalPlot.setCompositionToPosition() method

Change the way samples are mapped to the 3D space based on their composition

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setCompositionToPosition(compositionToPosition: ICompositionToPositionProvider): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  compositionToPosition | [ICompositionToPositionProvider](./composition-plot.icompositiontopositionprovider.md) | The object in charge of determining the position of the samples in 3D |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
